snippet: The terrorism trial of Sulaiman Abu Ghaith will not be delayed despite a claim by his lawyers that authorities may have mixed him up with a detainee at Guantánamo Bay with a similar name.
abstract: Terrorism trial of Sulaiman Abu Ghaith, son-in-law of Osama bin Laden, will not be delayed despite claim by his lawyers that government may have mistaken him for Abd al-Rahman Abdu Abu al-Ghayth Sulayman, who has similar name and stands accused of similar crimes; defense had sought delay in the trial in order to pursue information about Sulayman that might help their case.
lead_paragraph: The terrorism trial of Sulaiman Abu Ghaith will not be delayed despite a claim by his lawyers that authorities may have mixed him up with a detainee at Guantánamo Bay with a similar name.

headline.main: Effort to Delay Terror Trial of a Bin Laden Relative Fails
headline.print_headline: Effort to Delay Terror Trial of a Bin Laden Relative Fails
